messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
We just caught two boys breaking into our car, and we've detained one of them on our porch.
You got one on the front porch?
Yes, ma'am.
What's your address?
36-09 5th Avenue, and the other one's running.
But you got one?
Yes, ma'am.
Is it a male or female?
A male.
Black male, white male?
White male.
Okay, hold him there.
We are because our car was broken into about eight months ago, so we already know who did it.
No, that's not correct. But we do have one detained.
They're all just standing around here.
They're on their way, just hold them.
One of them busted our window.
Not again. They already got his speaker box.
Yes, they got his speaker box and one of them ran.
Okay, the police are on their way.
They got his CD player and ran with it.
Our dog started barking, that's how we heard them.
Do you know where the other suspect went?
No.
One more white kid is coming down the street right now.
Okay, just stay in the house and hold onto the one you have. They'll be there shortly.
He's shooting! They're shooting at us!
Shots fired. Shots fired. Stay down.
He shot my house! They're shooting my house!
Stay inside. Do you know where he is now?
Yes, he's walking down the street with a gun.
Can you describe him?
They were wearing hoodies. They're white males.
Okay, we've got the description. The police should be arriving any moment.
It’s been three minutes already.
They're doing their best. Please stay safe and inside.
My boyfriend has been shot. He's got blood all over him.
Is he conscious?
Yes, but he's losing a lot of blood.
Okay, I've updated the responders. The ambulance will be there soon.
They live in this neighborhood. The police should know them.
Please stay inside until help arrives.
I have three babies in this house and the police still aren't here.
They're on their way, ma'am. Just stay calm and stay inside.
What's your name?
Christy Lewis.
Alright, Christy. The fire department and ambulance are often dispatched together. They should be with you soon.
Okay, the police are here now. Can I hang up?
Yes, you can. Stay safe.
Thank you so much.
You're welcome.
